statements: DELETE FROM sports_venues WHERE location = 'New York';
DELETE FROM sports_venues WHERE capacity > 5000 AND location = 'New York';
DELETE FROM sports_venues WHERE venue_id IN (101, 102, 103);
DELETE FROM sports_venues WHERE venue_name LIKE '%Stadium%';
DELETE FROM venues WHERE capacity < 100 AND location = 'New York';
DELETE FROM venue_amenities WHERE amenity_id NOT IN (SELECT amenity_id FROM venue_amenities WHERE amenity_name = 'WiFi');
DELETE FROM venue_amenities WHERE venue_id = 'd52e3ad0-33a7-4d9c-80a5-68d20d6510c5' AND amenity_id = '7630f4a8-1192-409e-81c9-3b30fd03d3d8';
